name: Threshold Bitcoin
reason: The Gold Standard. Decentralized, permissionless Bitcoin on Solana. 0% Insider control.

name: Zeus Bitcoin
reason: Bitcoin liquidity via Zeus Network. Slight tariff for bridge/protocol risk, but fundamentally sound.

name: Wrapped Bitcoin (Portal)
reason: Standard Corporate Bitcoin. Custodial risk (BitGo) requires a small friction tariff compared to tBTC.

name: Coinbase Wrapped BTC
reason: Bitcoin held by a centralized exchange. Useful for liquidity, but carries maximum regulatory seizure risk.

name: Ondo US Dollar Yield
reason: Tokenized Short-Term US Treasuries. Represents productive capital (Yield) vs idle cash.

name: Ondo Short-Term US Gov
reason: Institutional-grade Treasury exposure. The preferred 'Working Capital' asset.

name: Paxos Gold (Portal)
reason: Tokenized Physical Gold. A classic store of value, though custodial.

name: Tether Gold (Portal)
reason: Tether-backed Gold. Higher trust assumption than Paxos, warranting a slightly higher tariff.
